column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Do you feel mocking the silliness of the upper level teachings is helpful ?
#Text=No. But , I think exposing their secret teachings is good .
#Text=It 's very strange that you have a religion where you ca n't tell what they believe until you pay them .
#Text=So it 's fine by me to expose their teachings so people can decide if that 's what they want to get into or not .
#Text=I suppose I 've helped make fun of Xenu , though .
#Text=As we understand it , the Church believes their teachings allow you to overcome illness .
#Text=Does this work ?
#Text=What do they do when it does n't ?
#Text=Scientology makes abundant medical claims in their writings , yes .
#Text=But they are not qualified in any way to deal with medical issues .
#Text=Lisa McPherson was the perfect example of that .
#Text=They were handling her according to Hubbard 's teachings , and she died as a result .
#Text=This is one of the ways Scientology hurts people .
#Text=It should be stopped .
#Text=Exposing their unscientific gobble-dee gook is hopefully helpful in stopping more harm .
#Text=What is Church of Scientology policy for off-loading its members when they become seriously ill ?
#Text=I 'm not sure of the answer to that .

#Text=I 've heard of " off-loading " where there have been reported cases that they 've kicked out people who are more a burden than a help and from what I know , they have no retirement plan for long-time employees or Sea Orgers .
#Text=I 'll give one example , Heber Jentzch 's wife , Yvonne , got cancer .
#Text=She died at a young age , they treated it as if she chose to do that .
#Text=In their obituaries they say " we look forward to X 's soon return " .
#Text=They believe in reincarnation .
#Text=What is your key issue with the Church having tax exempt status within the United States ?
#Text=1 ) they got it by pressuring the IRS rather than legitimately
#Text=2 ) they are n't qualified
#Text=3 ) they conducted the largest infiltration of the federal government in US history , then that government gives them tax exemption ?
#Text=These are the same people that were there back then .
#Text=Kendrick Moxon was part of Operation Snow White and he 's still a Scientology attorney .
#Text=Many reasons .
#Text=The Sklar case , and the Hernandez Supreme Court ruling also de-legitimizes their tax exemption .
#Text=Why mock an organization that has members who believe it has helped them ?
#Text=I hope we do n't mock .
#Text=I hope we inform , expose , and educate .
#Text=It 's easy to make fun of Xenu and that , and I suppose I 'm guilty of doing that too .
#Text=But the goal of critics is to inform , not mock .
#Text=Some people claim Scientology has worked for them , why should they be persecuted or hounded , for what after all is free choice of belief ?
